publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1217 Mr Mike Rumbles on behalf of the Standards Committee: Register of Members' Staff Interests-That the Parliament agrees to the establishment of a Register of Members' Staff Interests as set out in the appendices to the Standards Committee 3rd Report, 2000, and agrees that the provisions contained in those appendices shall apply to all MSPs as of 23 October 2000, that the provisions shall form an annexe to the code of conduct for Members and that the annexe shall be published for sale in hard copy and made available on the Parliament's website.

S1M-1217 Mr Mike Rumbles on behalf of the Standards Committee: Register of Members' Staff Interests—That the Parliament agrees to the establishment of a Register of Members’ Staff Interests as set out in the appendices to the Standards Committee 3rd Report, 2000, and agrees that the provisions contained in those appendices shall apply to all MSPs as of 23 October 2000, that the provisions shall form an annexe to the code of conduct for Members and that the annexe shall be published for sale in hard copy and made available on the Parliament’s website.
